release_notes.en-GB:
Search! A new app experience! 100+ additional shortcuts! 

This update's a big one, so let's dive in.

• Search, with two distinct modes. The biggest new feature, and the most requested one by far, has arrived. Centro 365 searches across all the admin centres by default, but you can switch to Focused mode to keep results related to the admin centre on screen. Perfect if you only look after one or two products

• A fresh new look, optimised for search and high resolution displays. I've been careful to retain its unique style whilst trying to improve usability through better use of space and colour. The vertical sidebar now changes dynamically depending on where you are and what you're doing, reducing visual clutter even further.

• Centro 365 can now open the top level pages of Microsoft 365 admin centres from your browsers omnibox. (That's the combined address bar and search bar). Pop open a new tab, type c365 and then the name of the admin centre you want.

• Another 100+ shortcuts, adding many of the new features and pages in Microsoft 365

• A new notification banner highlighting important changes and Centro 365 updates. (This will appear just below the search box and can be easily dismissed)

• Enhancements to dark mode, improving navigation and accessibility

• Lots of other quality of life improvements

description.en-GB:
Revolutionise your management of Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Azure with Centro 365. Whether you're in charge of a single product or multitasking across various roles as a Global Administrator, Centro 365 keeps everything you need within reach.

As Microsoft's collaborative platform grows, so does Centro 365. With over 625 shortcuts it's got something for everyone.

TOP FEATURES

• Over 625 Microsoft 365 shortcuts, spanning 18 different admin centres
• Powerful real time search, with two distinct modes of operation
• Quickly and easily reach admin centres from the address bar, with support for the omnibox
• Curate your own list of Favourites, which can be shortcuts from Centro 365 or items found elsewhere
• Customise what shows up when you open the extension, the admin centres that show up in the sidebar, and more
• Beautiful light and dark modes
• Handy keyboard shortcut so you don't need to grab your mouse

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

"Absolutely amazing"
- Terrell Ramsey

"Thanks Sean, Centro 365 is so very well made"
- Merill Fernando, Microsoft

"If you're an admin wandering around all the O365/Azure consoles and such, this extension is a speed path to get where you need to go"
- Rick Segal

"I use your Centro 365 extension on all my M365 tenants and recommend it to all my friends. Great extension man!"
- BuyMeACoffee Supporter

"I'm honestly shocked that this tool hasn't gotten more recognition. [...] This is much better than my admittedly very clumsy previous solution of bookmarking every centre & has saved me a huge amount of time"
- Jay

Proudly made, with love, in the UK.

caption.en-GB: Convenient access to multiple Microsoft 365 and Azure admin centres.
Easily find what you need with Centro 365's powerful search feature.
Curate your own list of Favourites, which can be shortcuts from Centro 365 or items found elsewhere.
Quickly and easily reach admin centres from the address bar, with support for the omnibox.
Over 625 Microsoft 365 shortcuts, spanning 18 different admin centres.

summary.en-GB: A better way to manage Microsoft 365
